participant_1.background:
I have a close relationship with my family and enjoy sharing my memories and seashells with them.
I'm from the Midwest, but I love exploring new places and meeting new people.
I went kayaking on a beautiful lake during my last vacation.
I went to the beach and relaxed.
i love to read and relax by the lake on the weekends.

participant_2.background:
My previous job was as a seamstress, and I used to love creating custom quilts for my customers.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe.
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.

content.text: Hello, what are some of your hobbies?
Hi there, I enjoy reading, sewing, and playing sports. What about you?
Hi, I love spending time outdoors. I recently went kayaking on a beautiful lake and it was amazing!
Kayaking sounds like a lot of fun, I've never tried it before. I've always been more interested in sewing and crafting.
That's cool! What kind of things do you like to sew?
I like to make custom quilts and clothing. I used to have a job as a seamstress, and I really enjoyed it.
Oh wow, that's so cool! I've never been able to sew anything but a button.
It's really not that hard, you should give it a try!
Maybe I will, thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome! So, what else do you like to do outdoors?
I love to go hiking, camping, and fishing. I also like to go to the beach and relax.
Hiking and camping sound fun! I've never been fishing before.
You should try it sometime, it's really relaxing.
I will, thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! I'm glad we had a chance to chat.
Me too, it was nice talking to you
